members.name: IDBTransaction.db
members.description: The database connection with which this transaction is associated.

members.name: IDBTransaction.error
members.description: Returns one of several types of error when there is an unsuccessful transaction. This property is null if the transaction is not finished, is finished and successfully committed, or was aborted with IDBTransaction.abort function.

members.name: IDBTransaction.mode
members.description: The mode for isolating access to data in the object stores that are in the scope of the transaction. For possible values, see the Constants section below. The default value is readonly.

members.name: IDBTransaction.objectStoreNames
members.description: Returns a DOMStringList of the names of IDBObjectStore objects.

members.name: IDBTransaction.onabort
members.description: The event handler for the abort event, fired when the transaction is aborted.

members.name: IDBTransaction.oncomplete
members.description: The event handler for the complete event, thrown when the transaction completes successfully.

members.name: IDBTransaction.onerror
members.description: The event handler for the error event, thrown when the transaction fails to complete.

members.name: IDBTransaction.abort
members.description: Rolls back all the changes to objects in the database associated with this transaction. If this transaction has been aborted or completed, then this method throws an error event.

members.name: IDBTransaction.objectStore
members.description: Returns an IDBObjectStore object representing an object store that is part of the scope of this transaction.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the requested object store.
